item.title: NHK 称日本经济刺激计划将包括价格减免措施
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司（NHK）报道，日本新的经济刺激计划将包括发放现金，帮助低收入家庭应对通货膨胀，以及为备灾提供额外资金。【原文：Japan’s new economic stimulus package will feature cash handouts to help low-income households deal with inflation and extra funding for disaster preparedness, according to public broadcaster NHK.】

item.title: 大选风险消散，美股命运取决于盈利情况
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后，投资者的注意力重新回到了经济增长上，企业盈利将成为美股的最大驱动力之一。【原文：Corporate earnings are set to become one of the biggest drivers of US stocks as investor focus returns to economic growth following Donald Trump’s US presidential election victory.】

item.title: 据说 Zetwerk 考虑在印度 IPO 筹资 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度供应链初创企业 Zetwerk Pvt Ltd. 正在考虑包括首次公开募股在内的筹资方案，这可能会帮助该公司筹集多达 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Zetwerk Pvt Ltd., an Indian supply chain startup, is considering fundraising options including an initial public offering that may help it raise as much as $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 地中海航运非洲全球物流公司在纳米比亚投资 4300 万美元
item.description: 地中海航运公司（MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company SA）的非洲物流部门到 2030 年将在纳米比亚投资 4000 万欧元（4300 万美元），以受益于不断增长的石油、天然气和可再生能源开发。【原文：MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company SA’s Africa logistics unit will invest as much as €40 million ($43 million) in Namibia by 2030 to benefit from growing oil, gas and renewable energy developments.】

item.title: 阿布扎比着眼于更多交易，打造人工智能驱动的全球健康公司
item.description: 阿布扎比最新成立的一家国家支持的投资公司正在研究数十项潜在的新交易，计划建立一个人工智能医疗冠军企业，并将其扩展到全球。【原文：One of Abu Dhabi’s newest state-backed investment companies is looking at dozens of potential new deals as it plans to build an artificial intelligence-powered healthcare champion that it can expand across the world.】

item.title: 立陶宛社会民主党不顾批评结成联盟
item.description: 立陶宛社会民主党周一与两个较小的政党签署了联合协议，在面临批评的情况下继续推进，放弃了其中一个其领导人被指控发表反犹太言论的政党。【原文：Lithuania’s Social Democrats signed a coalition agreement with two smaller parties on Monday, pressing ahead in the face of criticism to drop one of the parties whose leader is accused of making antisemitic remarks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯贸易增长五倍，印度力推本币交易
item.description: 随着印度与莫斯科的贸易急剧增长，印度正在争取更多与俄罗斯的贸易以卢比结算。【原文：India is batting for more trades with Russia to be settled in rupees as its commerce with Moscow witnesses a sharp increase.】

item.title: 报道称泰国将任命批评者为央行行长
item.description: 泰国将任命前财政部长吉滴拉-纳-拉农（Kittiratt Na-Ranong）为泰国央行新任主席，这表明泰国政府正试图加强对央行的控制，因为政府曾在货币政策和通胀目标问题上与央行发生过争执。【原文：Thailand is set to appoint former Finance Minister Kittiratt Na-Ranong as the new Bank of Thailand chairman, a sign of the government seeking to tighten its grip over the central bank with which it has sparred over monetary policy and inflation targets.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所收购英国 Aquis 公司，这是 2020 年以来最大的一笔收购交易
item.description: 瑞士交易所运营商 SIX Group AG 同意收购英国交易交易所和数据提供商 Aquis Exchange Plc，交易企业价值约为 1.94 亿英镑（2.5 亿美元）。【原文：Switzerland’s exchange operator SIX Group AG agreed to buy Aquis Exchange Plc, a UK-based trading exchange and data provider, in a deal with an enterprise value of approximately £194 million ($250 million).】

item.title: 你能真正消除银行系统的风险吗？
item.description:
影子银行的风险是否总会卷土重来？【原文：

Does shadow bank risk always make its way back?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：我们能否真正降低银行系统的风险？播客
item.description: 在过去的大约 15 年里，我们看到某些类型的风险已经转移到了受监管的存款银行之外。私人信贷蓬勃发展，将借贷活动从银行转移出去。多策略对冲基金吸收了大量沃尔克规则所禁止的自营交易活动。从纸面上看，这似乎不错。似乎各种风险都被转移到了系统性较弱的机构。但是，风险是否又会卷土重来？当这些外部风险被转移到系统性较弱的机构时会发生什么？【原文：Over the last roughly 15 years, we’ve seen a migration of certain types of risks outside of regulated deposit-taking banks. Private credit has boomed, shifting lending activity away from the banks. Multi-strategy hedge funds have scooped up a lot of the proprietary trading activity that was banned under the Volcker Rule. On paper, this looks good. It seems like various risks have been removed to less systemic institutions. But does the risk find its way back in? What happens when these outside e】

item.title: 大选后波动率骤降期权交易员追逐反弹
item.description: 关于美国总统大选投票后股市波动率下降的预测比预期来得更快，期权交易商目前正为股市的长期反弹做准备。【原文：The forecasts for a drop in stock-market volatility after the US presidential vote have come about even faster than expected, with options traders now positioning for an extended rally.】

item.title: 中国 10 月份信贷扩张放缓幅度超过预期
item.description: 中国 10 月份信贷扩张放缓的程度超出预期，原因是在传统的融资活动淡季，借贷需求减少。【原文：China’s credit expansion slowed more than expected in October, as borrowing demand dwindled in a traditionally slow month for financing activity.】

item.title: Adnoc Gas 预计全球液化天然气需求强劲，供应增加
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的液化天然气供应商认为，在本十年的剩余时间里，对这种燃料的需求将十分强劲，与此同时，它还将增加供应量。【原文：The biggest supplier of liquefied natural gas in the United Arab Emirates sees strong demand for the fuel through the rest of the decade just as it boosts supply.】

item.title: FTX 起诉 Binance，前首席执行官赵寻求 18 亿美元赔偿
item.description: FTX 对 Binance Holdings Ltd.及其前首席执行官赵长鹏提起诉讼，要求追回被 Sam Bankman-Fried 欺诈转移的近 18 亿美元。【原文：FTX filed a lawsuit against Binance Holdings Ltd. and its former Chief Executive Officer Changpeng Zhao, seeking to claw back almost $1.8 billion it alleges was fraudulently transferred by Sam Bankman-Fried.】

item.title: 埃尼公司将新的 Plenitude 股份出售给 EIP，首席执行官推动出售计划
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）同意向能源基础设施合作伙伴公司（Energy Infrastructure Partners AG）出售可再生能源部门 Plenitude 的额外股份，从而将这家瑞士基础设施集团的持股比例提高到 10%。【原文：Eni SpA agreed to sell an additional stake in renewables unit Plenitude to Energy Infrastructure Partners AG, boosting the Swiss infrastructure group’s holding to 10%.】

item.title: 捷克通胀加速，央行考虑暂停降息
item.description: 上个月，捷克共和国的通货膨胀率加速上升，为决策者考虑停止降息增加了论据。【原文：Inflation in the Czech Republic accelerated last month, adding to arguments for policymakers to consider halting interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 特里-史密斯回避英伟达股票，担心人工智能炒作过度
item.description: 今年以来，Nvidia 公司的股价几乎上涨了两倍，华尔街分析师对这家芯片制造商的评价也是一边倒的积极。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s stock has almost tripled this year, and Wall Street analysts are overwhelmingly positive on the chipmaker.】

item.title: NatWest 购入 10 亿英镑股票，英国继续退出持股
item.description: 随着英国财政部继续出售其在 NatWest Group Plc 的股份，NatWest Group Plc 从英国政府手中回购了 10 亿英镑（12.9 亿美元）的股份。【原文：NatWest Group Plc bought back £1 billion ($1.29 billion) of its shares from the UK government as the Treasury continues to sell down its stake in the lender.】

item.title: 挪威核心通货膨胀率连续一年稳步下降
item.description: 挪威10月份的基本通胀率连续第12个月放缓，符合分析师的预期，这进一步表明该国央行的限制性政策正在取得成效。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation slowed for the 12th consecutive month in October, in line with analyst expectations, adding to signs that the restrictive policy of the country’s central bank is bearing fruit.】

item.title: 印度 Citadel 证券公司全年利润随着市场繁荣而飙升
item.description: Citadel Securities 的印度部门在其首个全年运营中实现了交易收入和利润的跃升，突显了印度 4.6 万亿美元股票市场的强劲增长吸引了全球交易公司的目光。【原文：Citadel Securities’ India unit saw a jump in trading revenue and profit in its first full year of operations, highlighting the strong growth that has lured global trading firms to the country’s $4.6 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市三周收红后反弹
韩国散户持有的美股首次突破 1000 亿美元
item.description: 由于对大型科技股和杠杆基金的兴趣日益浓厚，韩国散户投资者增持美股的规模首次超过 1,000 亿美元。【原文：South Korean retail investors boosted their holdings of US stocks to more than $100 billion for the first time amid growing interest in Big Tech shares and leveraged funds.】

item.title: 据说 LG 将与 Axis 一起安排价值 15 亿美元的孟买上市计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，LG 电子公司已将 Axis Capital Ltd. 列入安排其印度业务部门潜在首次公开募股的银行名单。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. has added Axis Capital Ltd. to a roster of banks arranging a potential initial public offering of its Indian unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国贸易顺差接近创纪录的 1 万亿美元，令世界震惊
item.description: 中国的贸易顺差有望在今年创下新纪录，这将加剧全球贸易的不平衡，有可能激怒美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普，从而使中国与世界上一些最大的经济体发生冲突。【原文：China’s trade surplus is on track to hit a fresh record this year, increasingly leaving it on a collision course with some of the world’s biggest economies by aggravating an imbalance in global commerce that risks provoking President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 非洲最大电话公司沃达康六个月利润下降 18
item.description: 非洲市值最大的电话公司沃达康集团（Vodacom Group Ltd.）上半年净收入下降了 18%，原因是埃及和埃塞俄比亚的货币贬值带来了挑战。【原文：Africa’s biggest phone company by market value Vodacom Group Ltd. posted an 18% drop in first-half net income after currency devaluations in Egypt and Ethiopia proved a challenge.】

item.title: 特朗普引发加密货币投机热潮，狗狗币超越比特币
item.description: 最近几天，由于人们对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普领导下的加密货币行业前景的热情高涨，投机性押注浪潮一浪高过一浪，许多小型加密货币的表现超过了市场领头羊比特币。【原文：A bevy of smaller cryptocurrencies outperformed market-leader Bitcoin in recent days as enthusiasm about the sector’s prospects under President-elect Donald Trump encouraged a wave of speculative bets.】

item.title: 特朗普将埋葬 ESG，但它早已死亡
item.description:
绿色投资革命在美国从未有过机会 一度 陷入文化战争 ，但这并不是唯一的死因

。【原文：

The green investing revolution never stood a chance in the US once ensnared by the culture wars, but that wasn’t the only cause of death

】

item.title: 瑞士央行行长马丁认为中东战争和美国投票不会给法郎带来压力
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副行长安托万-马丁（Antoine Martin）认为，中东冲突和美国大选不会对瑞士法郎造成更大压力。【原文：The Swiss National Bank doesn’t see increased pressure on the franc from the conflict in the Middle East and the US elections, according to Vice President Antoine Martin.】

item.title: 美国影响力投资者斥资 15 亿美元瞄准农业科技初创企业
item.description: 美国一家非营利组织的目标是在 2030 年前筹集 15 亿美元，投资于专注于发展中国家农业适应性的初创企业。【原文：A US nonprofit is aiming to mobilize $1.5 billion to invest in startups that focus on agricultural adaptation across the developing world by 2030.】
